h:head.h:title: Chunguza dalili za halia ya mama na mtoto

data.name: Chunguza dalili za halia ya mama na mtoto

text.value: Siku moja au zaidi baada ya kujifungua

Mkumbushe mama umuhimu wa kuzalia kituo cha afya kwa sababu zifuatazo: - Ni salama kwa afya yako na mtoto. -Kuna ushirikiano wa wataalam wa huduma za afya. -Huwezi kujua ni bahati mbaya gani inaweza kujitokeza. -Huduma za kujifungua ni bure mara nyingi. -Vituo ni visafi na vina dawa halisi.
Uliza mama: Kama alikuwa akihisi mtoto kucheza, ila sasa anahisi mtoto kutokucheza?
Muulize mama au mchunguze kama ana haya yafuatayo:
Kizunguzungu, kuchoka, kengele za masikioni au kupauka
MSHAURI MAMA: Inaonekana kuwa na matatizo Unalaazimika kwenda sasa hivi. Sisi tutakulipia gharama za usafiri kwenda katika kituo cha afya.
MSHAURI MAMA: Inaonekana kuwa na matatizo . Unalaazimika kwenda sasa hivi. Sisi tutakulipia gharama za usafiri kwenda katika kituo cha afya.
MSHAURI MAMA: Inaonekana kuwa na matatizo . Unalaazimika kwenda sasa hivi. Sisi tutakulipia gharama za usafiri kwenda katika kituo cha afya.
MSHAURI MAMA: Leo wewe kuwa na afya nzuri. Nijulishe kama utatokea mabadiliko.
Kila mama anahitajika kupelekwa kituo cha afya kujifungua.
Muulize mama au mchunguze kama ana haya yafuatayo:
Kuumwa sana kichwa au kutokuona vizuri.
MSHAURI MAMA: Ni usalama zaidi kuzaa mwanao Nitaandaa usafiri.
MSHAURI MAMA: Unayo matatizo yafuatayo: . Unanahitajika kwenda haraka. Nitaandaa usafiri. Sisi tutakulipia gharama za usafiri kwenda katika kituo cha afya.
MSHAURI MAMA :Unayo matatizo yafuatayo: Unanahitajika kwenda . haraka. Nitaandaa usafiri. Sisi tutakulipia gharama za usafiri kwenda katika kituo cha afya.
Kila mama na mtoto wanahitajika kupelekwa kituo cha afya baada ya kujifungua.

Mpanguse mtoto kwa kitambaa kisafi na kikavu,mfunike,mtunze mtoto na joto na mkavu.Kama mama hajambo muhimize amshikilie mtoto kwa karibu na amnyonyeshe.Mwambie anaweza kumnyonyesha mtoto wakati wowote anapohitaji.
Kanda tumbo la mama chini ya kitovu kuzuia damu kutoka kwa wingi kwenye kizazi. Ni pande ngapi za kanga mama anatakiwa kubadilisha?
Muulize na umchunguze kam ana haya yafuatayo:
Je mtoto ana rangi ya bluu?
NYANYUA MIGUU YA MTOTO. SAFISHA MDOMO NA PUA YA MTOTO.
Uliza mama au angalia kadi yake ya kliniki: Je mtoto amezaliwa chini ya miezi tisa?
ANGALIA MTOTO: Mtoto ni ndogo sana?
MSHAURI MAMA :Wewe na mtoto wako mnaonekana kuwa na afya nzuri sasa lakini inahitajika kwenda kukaguliwa na mtaalamu wa afya.
MSHAURI MAMA: Mama, wewe una tatizo . Tunahitaji kwenda
MSHAURI MAMA: Mama, mtoto ana tatizo Tunahitaji kwenda
MSHAURI MAMA: Mama, wewe/mtoto mna matatizo . Tunahitaji kwenda
ULIZIA NA CHUNGUZA MAMA: Tangu kujifungua, je mama ameona kati ya haya yafuatayo:
Kutokwa damu nyingi baada ya kujifungua?
Majimaji yenye harufu mbaya kutoka ukeni?
Umekuwa ukijisikia huzuni au kukata tamaa?
MUULIZE MAMA KAMA MNAWEZA KUMCHUNGUZA MTOTO PAMOJA: kama mtoto ana haya yafuatayo?
Kitovu kuvuja damu,chekundu au kinatoa uchafu?
Kifafa, mishituko ya mishipa, kuumwa mgongo
Kupumua kwa shida au haraka haraka?
Uchafu wa macho au kuvimba macho?
rangi ya njano machoni au mwilini?
MSHAURI MAMA: Mama, wewe una tatizo . Tunahitaji kukupeleka katika
MSHAURI MAMA: Mama, wewe una tatizo . Tunahitaji kukupeleka katika
MSHAURI MAMA: Mama, mtoto wako ana matatizo Tunahitaji kumpeleka katika kituo cha afya
MSHAURI MAMA: Mama, mtoto wako ana matatizo Tunahitaji kumpeleka katika kituo cha afya
MSHAURI MAMA: Mama, mtoto wako ana matatizo . Tunahitaji kumpeleka katika kituo cha afya
MSHAURI MAMA: Sisi tutakulipia gharama za usafiri kwenda katika kituo cha afya.
ITA USAFIRI. PIGA SIMU KITUO CHA AFYA. ANZISHA RUFAA.
One day or more after delivery

Remind mother of the importance of facility delivery for the following reasons: - It's safer for your health and your baby. - There is a team of skilled health workers. - You cannot predict what might go wrong. - Delivery is free in most cases. -Facility is clean and hygienic and has the right medicines.
Ask the mother: Have you felt fetal movement before but now are experiencing a lack of fetal movement?
Ask mother and observe if she has any of the following:
Dizziness, fatigue, tinnitus (tingling in ears) or pale pallor.
ADVISE MOTHER: You are experiencing You should go to immediately.
ADVISE MOTHER: You are experiencing . You should go to immediately.
ADVISE MOTHER: You are experiencing . You should go to immediately.
ADVISE MOTHER: Today you seem healthy. Contact me if anything changes.
Every mother should be taken to a health facility for delivery.
Ask mother and observe if she has any of the following:
ADVISE MOTHER: It is safest for you to deliver your baby at . I will arrange tranport.
ADVISE MOTHER: You are having these problems : You should go to immediately. I will arrange and pay for transport.
You are having these problems : You should go to . immediately. I will arrange transport.
Every mother and baby should be taken to a health facility after birth.

Dry the baby using a clean, dry cloth. Wrap the baby. Keep the baby dry and warm. If the mother is OK, encourage her to hold the baby close to her body and breastfeed. Tell her she should breastfeed anytime the baby wants.
MASSAGE MOTHER'S STOMACH BELOW THE NAVEL TO STOP UTERINE BLEEDING. How many kangas per hour does the mother need to change?
Ask and observe if she has any of the following:
ELEVATE BABY'S FEET. CLEAN BABY'S MOUTH AND NOSE.
Does baby have any congenital abnormality?
Ask mother or look at her RCH4 card. Is the baby premature (less than 36 weeks)?
OBSERVE BABY: Is the baby very small?
Advise mother: You and your baby may seem healthy now, but you need to go to to be checked out by a skilled health worker.
ADVISE mother: You have We need to go to the
ADVISE mother: Your child has We need to go to the
ADVISE mother: You/your child have : We need to go to the
ASK AND OBSERVE MOTHER: Since delivery, have you had any of the following?
Have you been feeling sad or hopeless?
ASK MOTHER TO EXAMINE BABY TOGETHER. Does baby have any of the following?
Convulsions, spasms, or arching of back?
yellow color in eyes or body?
Bulging anterior fontanel? (Look and touch with baby upright)
Has the baby passed a bowel movement?
ADVISE MOTHER: You have . We need to go to
ADVISE MOTHER: You have We need to go to
ADVISE MOTHER: Your baby has and needs to go to the facility and get care.
ADVISE MOTHER: Your baby has and needs to go to the facility and get care.
ADVISE MOTHER: Your baby has and needs to go to the facility and get care.
ADVISE MOTHER: We will pay for your transport to the health facility
CALL TRANSPORT. CALL HEALTH FACILITY. INITIATE REFERRAL. ITAUSAFIRI.
